messages.subject: Re: July 8th ****TIME****
messages.msgSnippet: Whenever I announce times I always end up leaving someone out...but YES the raid must go on.  Thank you SK for mentioning more cool anime we can t watch ^_^
messages.messageBody:
Whenever I announce times I always end up leaving someone out...but
YES the raid must go on. Thank you SK for mentioning more cool
anime we can't watch ^_^ summer is the season for anime
conventions...ofcourse if a convention was held where I live it
would be a deadly mixture of cosplayers and beer...

...RAID TIME...
NEW YORK Thu 9:00 PM *
LOS ANGELES Thu 6:00 PM *
CHICAGO Thu 8:00 PM *
SAU PAOLO Thu 10:00 PM

http://www.timeanddate.com

REMEMBER folks we if we don't have any of our story tellers...we'll
play the game ^_^

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Serizawa Kamo <serizawakamo@y...> wrote:
> Just wondering if there is a time for the chat on July
> 8th. As July 9th is a holiday here, I may be able to
> attend, but only later, since we have a local anime
> con here and I intend to go there to watch the show of
> Kageyama Hironobu and Sakamoto Eizo...
>
>
>
> Serizawa Kamo
> (who can't wait to see Sunday's show with Kageyama
> Hironobu, Sakamoto Eizo, Okui Masami and Endo Masaaki)
>
>

messages.subject: July 8th - time?
messages.msgSnippet: Just wondering if there is a time for the chat on July 8th. As July 9th is a holiday here, I may be able to attend, but only later, since we have a local anime
messages.messageBody:
Just wondering if there is a time for the chat on July
8th. As July 9th is a holiday here, I may be able to
attend, but only later, since we have a local anime
con here and I intend to go there to watch the show of
Kageyama Hironobu and Sakamoto Eizo...



Serizawa Kamo
(who can't wait to see Sunday's show with Kageyama
Hironobu, Sakamoto Eizo, Okui Masami and Endo Masaaki)
